title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Admission of a vulnerability clears the air between you and a person in your inner circle today. Perhaps you must break the ice with a work-spouse if tensions begin to feel like an actual marriage. Or you may be compelled to write an old-fashioned love letter to a beloved. But the nature of your relationship isnt what matters most. Returning to sincerity and honesty without pretense or fear is where you and another rediscover the beauty of your connection. Honesty is the highest form of intimacy. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
